category.description: The main category of the submission

customerReferenceNumber.description: A unique reference number for the submission.

externalReferenceId.description: A reference number used by the system creating the submission

forceIdentifier.description: The jurisdiction or brand ID of the force

highHarmFlag.description: Is a person in the submission vulnerable to harm.

ipAddress.description: The originating IP address of the submission, if known.

submitTime.description: The date / time of the submission

userAgent.description: The user agent (browser) used to report the incident.
